description: Auth0 SDK for Single Page Applications using Authorization Code Grant Flow with PKCE
name: @auth0/auth0-spa-js

scripts.build:stats: npm run build -- --environment WITH_STATS:true && open stats.html
scripts.prepack: npm run build && npm run test:es-check && npm run test && node ./scripts/prepack
scripts.test:es-check: npm run test:es-check:es5 && npm run test:es-check:es2015:module
